steps.title: Games
steps.des: My love for games pushed me to try to explore the depths of programming, trying to understand how games are designed. It was a difficult beginning.

steps.title: College Projects
steps.des: Studying also pushed my abilities in trying to design desktop programs.

steps.title: First real work
steps.des: My work with Al Arabiya Soft Company gave me a greater insight into the world of programming, and greatly motivated me to develop my skills in building applications and services.

steps.title: Computer Science and engineering
steps.des: 5 years of study in the Faculty of Engineering, graduated in 2021 - 2022.

steps.title: Project I
steps.des: I used Arduino to design a programmable game controller.

steps.title: Final Project
steps.des: I developed the controller to be wireless and built a library that allows programmers to use it in designing their games in the Unity engine.

steps.title: Arduino Robotics Course
steps.des: I took a course in Arduino robot programming at the Kuwait Center in Aden for a month.

steps.title: Aden Architecture Workshop
steps.des: A theoretical and practical workshop for a month, including field trips to the streets of Aden, trying to study the Adeni decor. I finished the workshop with my design for a caf√© with a modern Adeni style.

steps.title: 3D Decorations
steps.des: I first worked as an interior and exterior designer with Dar Al Arab Engineering for about a year.

steps.title: Technical support
steps.des: I started my first job with Al Arabiya Soft as a technical support employee for 6 months.

steps.title: Developer
steps.des: Then I was transferred to the programming department of the company for about a year and a half.

steps.title: Video Game
steps.des: My favorite game is Hollow Knight.

steps.title: 3D Desgin
steps.des: Interested in everything related to 3D design, technology and new programs in this field.

steps.title: Football
steps.des: Real Madrid fan.

steps.title: Watching movies
steps.des: I love watching movies and TV series, my favorite genre is drama, mystery and horror, and I like comedies sometimes.

steps.title: Programming
steps.des: Interested in everything related to programming and modern technologies, and interested in learning the field of Dev Ops one day.

steps.title: Brainstorming
steps.des: Looking for new ideas to implement, so that I can offer a different and new product.

steps.title: Analysis
steps.des: I analyze all aspects of the application trying to find weaknesses and complex aspects.

steps.title: Choosing framework
steps.des: Choosing the right framework is very important to build the best possible application or website.

steps.title: UI/UX
steps.des: First, the app interface is drawn with interactive elements and output as images with element dimensions.

steps.title: Frontend
steps.des: Convert images and sizes into a design that fits all device sizes.

steps.title: Backend
steps.des: Building the API service and database to add the ability to save site data via the control panel.

steps.title: Measurements
steps.des: Looking for new ideas to implement, so that I can offer a different and new product.

steps.title: Client ideas
steps.des: Ask the client several questions about what the final result of the work is expected to be.

steps.title: Collecting ideas
steps.des: Start by creating visual feedback about the nature of the design, trying to create new and elegant designs.

steps.title: Design
steps.des: Convert measurements and ideas into 3D designs.

steps.title: Rendering
steps.des: Create realistic rendering of designs in the form of images and videos

steps.title: Deliver the design
steps.des: Delivering the final design and measurements to the client and helping him implement them on the ground.
